text: John Thomas Brown (15 June 1901 – 1977) was an English footballer. He played as a full back for Leicester City, Wrexham, Nuneaton Town and Heanor Town. He was part of the Leicester City side which finished in what was until 2016 the club's highest ever league finish, of runners-up in 1928-29. ==References== * Category:1901 births Category:1977 deaths Category:People from Eastwood, Nottinghamshire Category:Association football fullbacks Category:English footballers Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:Heanor Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Brown (footballer, born 1901)
